description: Protect your valuable electronics with the AmazonBasics Netbook Sleeve. Featuring a durable, weather-resistant Neoprene cover, this bag helps cushion and protect mini laptops, netbooks, DVD players, Amazon Kindle, and more. Its customized design lets you tote your electronic device comfortably and conveniently, so it's ideal for students, travelers, and all on-the-go technology users.
title: AmazonBasics Sleeve for Netbooks and Tablets up to 10" including Apple iPad, Apple iPad 2 (Black)
